MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: A deep one priest can breathe air or water with equal ease.

MonsterTrait.Name: Frenzied Rage
MonsterTrait.Text: On its next turn after a deep one hybrid priest takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its melee attacks and adds +4 to spell and claws damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The deep one priest's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: sacred flame, shocking grasp 3/day each: inflict wounds, sanctuary, sleep 1/day each: ice storm, shatter

MonsterTrait.Name: Lightless Depths
MonsterTrait.Text: A deep one hybrid priest is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.

MonsterTrait.Name: Ocean Change
MonsterTrait.Text: A deep one born to a human family resembles a human child, but transforms into an adult deep one between the ages of 16 and 30.

MonsterTrait.Name: Voice of the Deeps
MonsterTrait.Text: A deep one priest may sway an audience of listeners with its rolling, droning speech, fascinating them for 5 minutes and making them dismiss or forget what they've seen recently unless they make a successful DC 13 Wisdom saving throw at the end of that period. If the saving throw succeeds, they remember whatever events the deep one sought to erase.

MonsterTrait.Name: Claws
MonsterTrait.Text: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
